title: BrainSkin
description: A program to create an unfolded surface that wraps the brain (skin) and Gyrification Indices.

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: Surface to smooth or the domain over which DSET is defined.

skingrid_volume.title: Skin grid volume
skingrid_volume.description: A high-res volume to provide a grid for voxelization steps.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix to use for variety of output files.

plimit.title: Path limit
plimit.description: Maximum length of path along surface in mm for node pairing.

dlimit.title: Distance limit
dlimit.description: Maximum length of Euclidean distance in mm for node pairing.

segdo.title: Segment display object
segdo.description: Output a displayable object file that contains segments between paired nodes.

voxelize.title: Voxelize method
voxelize.description: Voxelization method. Choose from: slow: Sure footed but slow, fast: Faster and works OK, mask: Fastest and works OK too (default).

infill.title: Infill method
infill.description: Infill method. Choose from: slow: proper infill, but not needed, fast: brutish infill, all we need (default).

out_file.title: Intermediate results file
out_file.description: Output intermediary results from skin forming step.

vol_skin.title: Volume skin mask
vol_skin.description: Deform an Icosahedron to match the outer boundary of a mask volume.

vol_hull.title: Volume hull mask
vol_hull.description: Deform an Icosahedron to match the convex hull of a mask volume.

no_zero_attraction.title: No Zero Attraction
no_zero_attraction.description: With vol_skin, the surface will try to shrink aggressively, even if there is no promise of non-zero values below.

node_dbg.title: Node Debug
node_dbg.description: Output debugging information for node N for -vol_skin and -vol_hull options.
